fields.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
fields.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
fields.ingredients: Spaghetti, Eggs, Parmesan Cheese, Pancetta, Black Pepper, Salt
fields.instructions: 1. Cook the spaghetti. 2. Fry the pancetta until crisp. 3. Beat the eggs and mix with cheese. 4. Combine spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture. 5. Season with salt and pepper.

fields.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
fields.description: A flavorful Indian curry dish made with marinated chicken and a spiced tomato sauce.
fields.ingredients: Chicken, Yogurt, Garlic, Ginger, Tomatoes, Garam Masala, Cream, Onion
fields.instructions: 1. Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices. 2. Grill the chicken. 3. Cook the onion, garlic, and ginger. 4. Add tomatoes and spices. 5. Stir in cream and add the chicken. 6. Serve with rice or naan.
